messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of structures were found at the dig site?
tents
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What appears to have been used as a communal tent at the dig site?
a large communal tent
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was found in the last tent at the dig site?
a painting studio
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was found in the sleeping tents at the dig site?
a notebook, various art pads, and some partly completed oil canvases
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What object was found in the Spot Hidden roll at the dig site?
a discarded rifle
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where were the sleeping tents located?
Near the dig site
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What did the Spot Hidden roll reveal?
A discarded rifle and Texan hat in a nearby bush
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What did Alistair Lawson tell the investigators about Brian Hall?
Meeting the Hunting Party (see page 351) about Brian Hall
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the artists from?
Boston
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of paintings are mostly shown on the art pads and canvases?
Landscapes and woodland scenes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who claims to have been experiencing the same dreams as the investigators?
Brian and Arthur Hall
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of scenes are mostly depicted in the art pads and canvases?
Landscapes and woodland scenes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is seen in one of the paintings, from behind, looking out onto the black waters?
Something horrible rising up out of the lake
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is described in the description of one of the paintings, 'A path snaking its way through the trees, the ground covered in dead, yellow leaves'?
A deserted wood
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the frightening dreams described as being 'uncannily similar to those the investigators are experiencing'?
The investigators' own dreams
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the state of the cabin when the investigators enter the clearing?
The cabin is dilapidated and shot through with many bullet holes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the state of the body of Christopher Dobbs?
Christopher Dobbs is impaled through the chest on a branch halfway up the tree.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is alive within the cabin and what is his condition?
Harris is alive within the cabin and is crazy from the Dream Call of Gla'aki.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Harris's primary concern?
Harris is concerned that the investigators are more of the horrors come to get him.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cause of the investigators' initial distraction?
The investigators are distracted by the discovery of the body of Christopher Dobbs.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition of Harris throughout the night?
He is crazy from the Dream Call of Gla'aki
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if investigators manage to pacify Harris?
He will explain that the girl is gone
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why will Harris continue shooting if investigators cannot incapacitate or calm him?
He will continue shooting, fearing the investigators are more of the horrors come to get him
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Harris after he explains the situation?
He will collapse into hysteria
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a player concerned about a similar dream do?
Make a Sanity roll, losing the same amount as originally prompted by the dream
